ModMetaData.name: LMC013.更为真实的黑夜 1.0
ModMetaData.author: Helpful Bot; Inspired by Viceroy, creator of Darkness Revamp which was updated by Cram and to A14 by Helpful Bot.
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html This mod changes lighting and saturation in Rimworld to be dynamically darker. This mod overrides your vanilla weather definitions (Could not be avoided, this was not elective) 此模式将Rimworld中的光照和饱和度更改为动态更暗。 这个mod会覆盖你的游戏原始天气定义（无法避免，这不是可选的） Includes: 变更包括： -Daylight remains unchanged but weather patterns have a stronger effect on light levels even during daylight hours. 日间亮度不会改变，但是即使在白天，天气也会对光照水平产生更强烈的影响。 -Nights are considerably darker. 夜间变得更为黑暗。 -Night darkness changes dynamically with weather conditions: 夜间的亮度会随着天气变化动态变化。 +Hard/Gentle snow are the lightest nights 暴风雪/落雪时期的夜晚是最亮的。 +Dry thunderstorms are only slightly darker than clear nights. 雷暴时期只比晴朗的夜晚稍微暗一些。 +Foggy Rain is the darkest. YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO SEE AREAS UNLIT BY TORCHES/LIGHTS DURING THIS WEATHER PATTERN. 雾雨时期是最黑暗的。在这种天气状况中，你甚至不能看到被火炬/灯光照亮的区域。 -Saturation (color strength) changes more dynamically in response to weather. - 饱和度（颜色强度）根据天气变化更加动态。 -Movespeed and ranged accuracy are very close to vanilla values. Hard snow and foggy rain are harshest on accuracy and movement (foggy rain movement is same as rain). 移动速度和远程精度非常接近游戏预设值。 暴风雪和雾雨对射击精度和移动速度的影响最为严重（雾雨时期的移动速度与降雨一样）。 -Eclipses ARE NOT CHANGED CURRENTLY. I had to remove the dll in the a16 to a17 process. Working on re adding this. 未对日食期间的亮度进行修改。 Uptaded to 1.0 version by Wemd.
